executable.name: fgcz_scaffold.bash
executable.description: This is the 2015 generic scaffold application interface between BFabric and ScaffoldBatch4 - non-batch (multiple mascot result files into a single scaffold file).

parameter.description: inidcates if x!tandem should be used for PSM confirmation.
parameter.label: use x!tandem

parameter.description: combine multiple mascot result files into a single protein list. if not selected, each input resource (mascot result file) is treated as individual BiologicalSample.
parameter.label: use mudpit

parameter.description: All input resource are handled as a single BiologicalSample. This option is usually used with non-mudpid.
parameter.label: use GeLC-MS configuration

parameter.description: This command is specific to Scaffold Q+. These commands specify the quantitative model type, name, and purity correction for the labels. Possible values are: 'iTRAQ 4-Plex' and 'iTRAQ 8-Plex
parameter.label: QuantitativeModel
